text: Money plant is the trivial name of several plants: * Epipremnum aureum - a tropical vining plant from the Solomon Islands * Lunaria annua - a herbaceous biennial, grown for its attractive spring flowering and dried silver seed pod middles * Crassula ovata - a small plant with fleshy leaves, also known as a jade plant or a friendship tree * Pilea peperomioides - a small plant with very round, dark green leafs, also known as Chinese Money Plant, Lefse Plant, or Missionary Plant and is from the south of China
title: Money plant
